Na szkoleniu zdobdziecie midzy innymi wiedz na temat:

Bdziemy omawia wszystkie niuansy, psu i naprawia aby ka偶dy z Was dosta porzdn dawk wiedzy i m贸g samodzielnie odtworzy wszystkie wypieki w swoich warunkach

Miejsca ograniczone
description.en:
Hello everyone! I warmly invite you to a two-day training in semi-puff and puff pastry! I will lead it personally and teach you how to prepare classics as well as modern trends in the world of sweet pastries.

Semi-puff pastry:
- Croissant
- Rolls with mango-passion fruit cream
- Danish with apricot and marzipan
- Kokardka (cross lamination) with raspberry jam and vanilla cream
- Bostock with caramel cream and coffee
- Vanilla flan with seasonal fruits

Puff pastry:
- Mille feuille
- Bichon with lemon cream
- Palmiers

During the training you will gain knowledge about:
- Semi-puff pastry production technology
- Yeast dough technology
- Equipment needed for semi-puff and yeast dough production
- Freezing techniques
- Deferred dough rising management systems
- Filling preparation technology

We will discuss all the nuances, make mistakes and fix them so that each of you gets a solid dose of knowledge and can independently recreate all the pastries in your own conditions

Location: Tychy/training room of Inplus company
锔Date: 22-23.09
Training cost: 2400z gross

Training package includes:
- Lunch each day
- Professional apron
- Recipe folder
- Huge amount of pastries to take home
- Solid dose of knowledge
- And a large portion of good fun

Limited places

description.en:
I invite you to an exclusive workshop dedicated to chocolate and modern desserts! For two days we will explore the world of high-quality chocolate and create spectacular desserts.

Workshop program:
- Chocolate tempering - theory and practice
- Chocolate mousse with various additions
- Praline truffles with unique flavors
- Chocolate tart with salted caramel
- Chocolate souffl茅
- Brownies with different textures
- Ganache in various consistencies
- Chocolate decorations

You will learn:
- How to choose the right chocolate for different applications
- Chocolate working techniques
- Creating perfect textures
- Combining flavors with chocolate
- Restaurant-level dessert presentation

Location: Warsaw, Chocolate Atelier
Price: 1800z gross
Included: materials, lunch, apron, recipes, pastries to take home
Maximum 12 people

description.en:
Discover the secrets of traditional baking! Two-day course dedicated to artisan breads and classic bakery.

Course program:
- Sourdough - bread starter from scratch
- Rye bread on sourdough
- French baguettes
- Focaccia with herbs
- Bread with nuts and fruits
- Hamburger buns
- Challah - braided bread
- Italian ciabatta

Techniques you'll master:
- Maintaining and caring for sourdough
- Kneading and shaping techniques
- Fermentation control
- Baking at different temperatures
- Creating crispy crust
- Assessing bread readiness

Location: Krakow, Traditional Bakery
Price: 1500z gross
Package includes: all ingredients, lunch, apron, recipes, breads to take home
Maximum group of 10 people

description.en:
Course dedicated to modern donuts and doughnuts! From classics to the latest trends in the world of fried sweets.

Workshop program:
- Classic yeast donuts
- Cake donuts (sponge cake)
- French donuts (beignets)
- Churros with various fillings
- Glazes and icings - from classic to colorful
- Fillings: rose, pistachio, lemon curd, nutella
- Decorations and toppings
- Frying techniques for different dough types

You will learn:
- How to prepare different types of dough
- Control oil temperature
- Shaping techniques
- Creating perfect glazes
- Professional decorating
- Storage and serving

Location: Gdansk, Sweets Studio
Price: 1200z gross
Included: ingredients, equipment, lunch, recipes, donuts to take home
Maximum 15 participants

description.en:
Get ready for the holidays with our special Christmas baking course! Tradition meets modernity.

Christmas program:
- Classic Polish gingerbread
- German Lebkuchen
- Gingerbread houses
- Traditional and modern poppy seed cake
- Christmas cheesecake with dried fruits
- Kutia and other traditional sweets
- Christmas cookies in various shapes
- Royal icing and decorations

Special techniques:
- Preparing gingerbread dough
- Decorating with royal icing
- Creating 3D gingerbread constructions
- Working with dried fruits and spices
- Traditional storage methods
- Sweet gift wrapping

Location: Wroclaw, Christmas Workshop
Price: 1600z gross
Bonuses: family recipes, Christmas decorations, gift boxes
Group up to 12 people
Special Christmas gift for each participant!
